name: cosmic-lib
description: A JavaScript implementation of the CosmicLink protocol for Stellar
author: MisterTicot

scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.build-misc: cp -f AUTHORS LICENSE README.md package-lock.json web
scripts.build: sh setenv.sh -p && for i in js css doc html misc; do npm run build-$i || return; done
scripts.rebuild: npm run get && cp -f web/package-lock.json . && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.check: npm run rebuild && cd web && git status
scripts.watch-js: npm run build-es5 && webpack -d --watch & npm run watch-es5
scripts.watch: sh setenv.sh -d && npm run build-html && npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
scripts.serve: npm run watch & cd web && live-server --no-browser
